game_description: Join the unit of elite soldiers to dismantle the head of the evil Snakes Organization in this fast-paced action shooter. Hide behind a riot shield, snipe the enemies from a distance, or charge in with guns blazing, and don’t forget to dodge the vast amounts of bullets being fired at you. Play the singleplayer campaign, co-op mode, or zombie survival. Each level and mode brings something new into play. Operation Serpens is developed for VR with free locomotion, teleportation, room-scale, and bHaptics support. Discord https://discord.gg/vRjwPdjpGB Features: * Singleplayer campaign story with three difficulty levels. * Co-op multiplayer mode with up to four players. * Zombie survival mode. * Free locomotion, teleportation and room-scale. * Lots of guns, grenades, flashbangs and drones. * bHaptics support. Suit up!

review_3: This is a great little fun shooter. I like the cartoon style. Challenging and fun. Doesn't take itself seriously and you will play with a smile. Great value and replayability. Maybe need to work on the voice acting .. but we'll done guys .. cracking little game! Andy P 2593
review_4: I’m a 56 yo female tech geek and this is my favorite shooter game. Easy to reload - just press A or bring the gun to your waist. My 23 yo son and I play in co-op mode￼. Several different levels and environments keep it very exciting. The enemy’s bullets come at you in slow motion so you can dodge them so you don’t get killed right away like some of the more complex FPS games.￼ The sights on guns are realistic and help tremendously when killing your targets. Or you can instinctively shoot & do ok too, especially with closer targets. As a retired State Trooper, it emulates out live tactical training - Hiding behind targets, taking cover and taking down the enemies. ￼Sneaking around the mall and killing the intruders is super fun. You go in all these different stores and rooms and find different guns and shields and other weapons. Very exciting and engaging game.￼ As far as comfort, use the left joystick to teleport & the right for smooth walking or running and you will never get motion sickness.￼
